meanings.sent1: She looked unawaked as she slept peacefully on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The unawaked baby yawned and stretched after a long nap.
meanings.sent3: The unawaked cat didn't even flinch when the doorbell rang.
meanings.sent4: The unawaked city slowly came to life as the sun rose over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The unawaked forest was silent except for the rustling of leaves in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The unawaked child continued to dream peacefully in bed.
meanings.sent2: The unawaked computer screen remained dark until the power button was pressed.
meanings.sent3: The unawaked alarm clock failed to rouse the heavy sleeper.
meanings.sent4: The unawaked town was still shrouded in darkness before dawn.
meanings.sent5: The unawaked phone buzzed with notifications, but went unnoticed.

meanings.sent1: His unawaked interest in the topic showed in his lack of questions during the lecture.
meanings.sent2: The unawaked audience barely clapped at the end of the boring performance.
meanings.sent3: The unawaked dog showed no excitement when presented with its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The unawaked curiosity of the students led to a quiet classroom discussion.
meanings.sent5: The unawaked party guests sat quietly, waiting for something interesting to happen.

meanings.sent1: The unawaked security guard failed to notice the intruder sneaking past.
meanings.sent2: The unawaked driver almost missed the turn because of drowsiness.
meanings.sent3: The unawaked student didn't hear the teacher calling their name.
meanings.sent4: The unawaked squirrel didn't react to the approaching cat until it was too late.
meanings.sent5: The unawaked hiker wandered off the trail, lost in thought and unaware of the surroundings.
